mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reservation (reservation_id, reservation_date, emp_id, ConferenceRoom_no, reservationStartTime, reservationEndTime) VALUES (#{reservationId}, #{reservationDate}, #{empId}, #{conferenceRoomNo}, #{reservationStartTime}, #{reservationEndTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_reservation where reservation_date = #{selectedDate} AND conferenceRoom_no = #{roomNo}

SELECT reservation_id AS reservationId, reservation_date AS reservationDate, emp_id AS empId, ConferenceRoom_no AS conferenceRoomNo, reservationStartTime, reservationEndTime FROM tbl_reservation WHERE ConferenceRoom_no = #{conferenceRoomNo} AND reservation_date = #{date} AND ( (reservationStartTime < #{endTime} AND reservationEndTime > #{startTime}) )
SELECT * FROM tbl_reservation WHERE emp_id = #{empId} ORDER BY ConferenceRoom_no ASC, reservation_date ASC, reservationStartTime ASC
